review: Easy to get started and enjoy.
author: Vicki K. Potter

review: It worked for the first movie we rented but when I tried to use it to get an ESPN football game it kept coming up with error messages and I never got the station through the fire stick.
author: Lawrence Zukowski

review: it is a bit confusing at first. I have a big screen 1080 and I applied it to hdm12. My security system with dvr is all connected in this console. It only took about 15 minutes to get it working. Everything is costly from that point on. There is a charge for all movies and I guess prime is next for me.The wonderful part-NO ADVERTISEMENTSFire TV Stick
author: richard corbett

review: Very good for the price. Does just what they say it will do. I belong to Amazon Prime so it is very worth it.
author: Connie Dengel

review: We were able to hook this up without any persons under 30 being present.  Good instructions.  We would have liked some advice on the capacity of one's router for downloading.  We had to buy a new router with more capacity
author: Thomas G. Richards

review: Very easy to set up and use.  A must if you have Amazon Prime! Highly recommend.
author: Cyberdroid
